hero.title: Advanced Technology
hero.subtitle: Reliable Solutions
hero.description: With over 15 years of experience, we provide the highest quality technological solutions to healthcare professionals.

about.title: Trusted Partner in
about.subtitle: Healthcare Technologies
about.description1: As BiomiraMed, we are one of the leading companies in the healthcare technology sector with over 15 years of experience. We continue to add value to the healthcare sector with our innovative solutions and quality service approach.
about.description2: Our mission is to provide reliable, effective and user-friendly solutions to healthcare professionals using the latest technologies. By aiming for excellence in every project, we focus on improving patient care quality.

products.title: Innovative Products

viscoPhi.title: ViscoPhi™
viscoPhi.description: ViscoPhi™ is a sterile ready-to-use intra-articular viscoelastic implant gel solution to treat human joint disorders such as osteoarthritis and it comes in a prefilled, ready to use syringe.
viscoPhi.feature1: Linear bond, Crosslinked and Combined Hyaluronic Acid

visOcu.title: VisOcu™
visOcu.description: VisOcu™ is a sterile, cohesive, isotonic, pyrogen-free, and viscoelastic preparation of highly purified HA and HPMC.
visOcu.feature2: Lubrication, support and protection of ocular tissues

philExir.title: PhilExir™
philExir.description: PhilExir™ is a cutting-edge injectable designed to revitalize facial contours and awaken skin radiance, helping you look refreshed, lifted, and beautifully renewed.
philExir.feature4: Challenge fatigue and aging with PhilExir

products.ctaDescription: Our expert team is ready to develop custom healthcare technology solutions for you. Contact us immediately and let's bring your projects to life.

detail.contactDescription: Contact us to get more information about our product catalogs

intraocular.title: Intraocular Viscoelastics
intraocular.description: Premium ophthalmic viscoelastic solutions designed for optimal surgical control and eye protection.

intraArticular.title: Intra-articular Viscoelastics
intraArticular.description: Advanced joint injection solutions designed to increase mobility and reduce discomfort.

dermalFillers.title: Dermal Filler & Cosmetics
dermalFillers.description: Luxury aesthetic products focused on natural-looking improvement, safety, and long life.

sustainable.title: Sustainable Practices
